title: Carmen McRae Sings Great American Songwriters (1955-59)
description:
CARMEN McRAE SINGS GREAT AMERICAN SONGWRITERS

Carmen McRae - vocals, accompanied by...

Mat Mathews Quintet: Herbie Mann (fl), Mat Mathews (acc), Dick Katz (p), Wendell Marshall (b), Kenny Clarke (d); June 16, 1955

01. You Took Advantage Of Me    [2:39]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Ralph Burns; December 29, 1955

02. Yesterdays    [2:37]
03. Last Night When We Were Young    [2:37]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Tadd Dameron, March 28, 1956

04. I'm Putting All My Eggs In One Basket    [2:25]
05. Blue Moon    [2:35]
06. I Was Doing All Right    [2:48]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by  Jimmy Mundy; March 29, 1956

07. My Foolish Heart    [3:15]

Ray Bryant Trio: Ray Bryant (p), Ike Isaacs (b), Specs Wright (d); March 6 & April 18, 1957

08. My Funny Valentine    [4:21]
09. Nice Work If You Can Get It    [2:30]
10. Between the Devil And The Deep Blue Sea    [2:27]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Fred Katz; December 16, 1957

11. All The Things You Are    [2:25]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Fred Katz; April 21, 1958

12. I Get A Kick Out Of You    [2:16]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Jack Pleis; October 29, 1958

13. My Man's Gone Now    [4:14]
14. Summertime    [3:00]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Frank Hunter; December 2, 1958

15. He Was Too Good To Me    [2:43]
16. How Long Has This Been Going On?    [4:06]
17. When I Fall In Love    [3:48]
18. My Romance    [3:53]

Orchestra arranged & Conducted by Luther Henderson; March 3-4, 1959

19. I Concentrate On You    [3:31]
20. Ev'ry Time We Say Goodbye    [3:02]

MORE INFO ON SCANS

1993 Decca/GRP
